Privacy Policy

At Ardena, your privacy is a top priority. This policy explains how we collect, use, and protect your information. By using our website, you consent to these terms.


1. Information We Collect

Personal Information: Name, email, phone number, or other details you provide.
Usage Data: Pages visited, time spent on-site, and analytics data.
Cookies: Small data files stored on your device to enhance functionality and gather insights.

2. How We Use Your Information

To respond to inquiries and provide services.
To improve website performance and personalize your experience.
To send updates or promotional content, with your consent.

3. Sharing Your Information

We do not sell or share your personal information, except:
When required by law.
With trusted service providers who assist with website functionality and analytics.

4. Your Rights

Access, update, or delete your personal information by contacting us.
Opt-out of promotional emails by clicking “unsubscribe.”
Manage cookie settings through your browser preferences.

5. Security Measures

We employ industry-standard security measures to protect your data but cannot guarantee absolute security for online transmissions.

6. Contact Us

For privacy-related concerns, email us at: hello@ardenatech.com
